thread.title: The amount of aid being allowed into Gaza has been described as only a trickle, while medics say those trying to collect it are coming under attack | National | ktbs.com

author: Eyad BABA
title: The amount of aid being allowed into Gaza has been described as only a trickle, while medics say those trying to collect it are coming under attack | National | ktbs.com
text:
Tags
As featured on
A US- and Israeli-backed charity operating in Gaza accused Palestinian militant group Hamas of attacking aid workers en route to a distribution centre on Wednesday, saying at least five people were killed.
A US- and Israeli-backed charity operating in Gaza accused Palestinian militant group Hamas of attacking aid workers en route to a distribution centre on Wednesday, saying at least five people were killed.
